name: Alex
description: Alex is an aspiring athlete who dreams of being a professional gridball player.

name: Elliott
description: Elliott lives alone in a cabin on the beach. He’s a writer with a poetic soul.

name: Harvey
description: Harvey is the local doctor and loves vintage things, coffee, and jazz music.

name: Sam
description: Sam is a energetic young man with a passion for music and skateboarding.

name: Sebastian
description: Sebastian is a reclusive programmer who lives in his parents’ basement.

name: Shane
description: Shane is a blunt, awkward man who likes beer and working at JojaMart.

name: Leah
description: Nature-loving artist who lives alone in a small cottage outside of Pelican Town.

name: Abigail
description: Abigail lives at the general store and has a rebellious streak. She's into the occult and video games.

name: Emily
description: Emily is an eccentric, spiritual soul who loves making her own clothes and crystals.

name: Haley
description: Haley is a popular girl who’s into fashion and photography, but she may surprise you.

name: Maru
description: Maru is an intelligent inventor who works at the clinic and builds gadgets in her spare time.

name: Penny
description: Penny is a kind-hearted teacher who lives in a trailer with her mother Pam.

name: Caroline
description: Caroline is Pierre's wife and Abigail's mother. She spends her time in the shop and enjoys tea.

name: Clint
description: Clint is the local blacksmith who forges and upgrades tools for a price.

name: Demetrius
description: Demetrius is a scientist and Maru’s father. He studies local wildlife.

name: Dwarf
description: The Dwarf lives in the mines and speaks Dwarvish until you learn the language.

name: Evelyn
description: Evelyn is an elderly resident who loves gardening and baking cookies.

name: George
description: George is a grumpy but lovable old man in a wheelchair. He’s Evelyn’s husband.

name: Gus
description: Gus runs the Stardrop Saloon and is known for his cooking and kindness.

name: Jas
description: Jas is a shy, young girl who lives with Marnie. She loves animals and drawing.

name: Jodi
description: Jodi is a kind mother of two who lives in Pelican Town and enjoys cooking.

name: Krobus
description: Krobus is a friendly Shadow Brute who lives in the sewers. You can live with him as a roommate.

name: Lewis
description: Mayor Lewis has been the mayor of Pelican Town for over twenty years.

name: Linus
description: Linus lives a simple life in a tent near the mines. He values nature and solitude.

name: Marnie
description: Marnie runs the local animal shop. She takes care of Jas and has a secret with Mayor Lewis.

name: Pam
description: Pam is Penny’s mother and the town’s bus driver. She enjoys a drink at the Saloon.

name: Pierre
description: Pierre owns the general store and is Caroline’s husband. He's competitive with JojaMart.

name: Robin
description: Robin is the town carpenter and Demetrius’ wife. She’s friendly and energetic.

name: Vincent
description: Vincent is a young boy who lives with Jodi and Kent. He loves candy and bugs.

name: Willy
description: Willy runs the fish shop by the beach and loves the sea.

name: Wizard
description: The Wizard lives in the tower in Cindersap Forest and studies magical phenomena.
